maskedImageNotes.maskImg: SVG mask file path for custom image shapes
maskedImageNotes.commonShapes: Hexagon, star, blob, wave, custom logo shape
maskedImageNotes.maskRequirements: SVG file with <mask> element, image applies mask via CSS mask-image
maskedImageNotes.browserSupport: Modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge). No IE11 support.
maskedImageNotes.fallback: Browsers without mask support show rectangular image
maskedImageNotes.createMask: Design in Illustrator/Figma, export as SVG, ensure <mask> with white fill
maskedImageNotes.performance: SVG masks are GPU accelerated, no performance impact

productCatalogTips.priceGradient: Gradient background emphasizes price as primary CTA

styles.style-1: Simple list, text-only or with background boxes, left/center/right aligned
styles.style-2: Interactive flip cards with image front and text back, horizontal or vertical flip
styles.style-3: Horizontal row layout with image left, dotted/dashed/solid line separator, price right

commonPatterns.tagFieldFormat: Pipe-separated values (Tag1|Tag2|Tag3), splits into individual styled tags
commonPatterns.priceFieldUsage: Can be repurposed for time (9:00 AM), duration (90 min), or custom text
commonPatterns.imageFieldSources: WordPress media library images, external URLs, or custom uploaded assets

responsivePatterns.style-1: Maintains alignment, reduces font sizes on mobile
responsivePatterns.style-2: Cards stack vertically on mobile, flip effect still works on touch
responsivePatterns.style-3: Image reduces to 50-60px on mobile, content wraps below if needed

validationRules.title: Required, item name/title
validationRules.price: Required, can be price ($12.99), time (9:00 AM), duration (45 min), or custom text
validationRules.tagField: Optional, pipe-separated values (Tag1|Tag2|Tag3), renders as individual styled tags
validationRules.description: Optional, item description (hidden on style-2 front, shown on back)
validationRules.imageField: Optional for style-1, required for style-2, optional for style-3
validationRules.maskImg: style-3 only, SVG mask file for custom image shapes

warnings: tagField uses pipe character (|) as separator - other separators won't work
style-2 flip effect requires hoverEffect attribute ('horizontal' or 'vertical')
style-2 image is required - front card will be empty without imageField.url
style-3 dotted line (lineStyle) only appears when openBorder: 1 is set
maskImg (SVG masks) only works in modern browsers - IE11 shows rectangular image fallback
Too many tags (>4) can clutter layout - keep to 2-3 tags per item for readability
style-2 normalBG applies to front card, hoverBG applies to back card (different backgrounds)
imageSize 'full' can load very large images - use 'medium' or 'large' for performance
Circular imgShape (style-2) crops square images - use 1:1 aspect ratio images for best results
boxAlign doesn't work with style-1 (use Alignment instead for style-1)
descColor white text requires dark background - ensure WCAG AA contrast ratio 4.5:1 minimum
style-3 imgMinWidth and imgMaxWidth should be equal for consistent sizing (e.g., both 80px)
commonMistakes: Using commas instead of pipes in tagField ('Tag1,Tag2' won't split, use 'Tag1|Tag2')
Forgetting to set openTypography: 1 before setting typography values (typography won't apply)
Using style-2 without imageField.url (front card will be blank)
Setting lineStyle.type without lineStyle.openBorder: 1 (line won't show)
Using very long title text (>60 characters) causing layout overflow on mobile
Not setting hoverEffect for style-2 (defaults to horizontal, may not match design intent)
Using rectangular images with imgShape: 'circle' (image gets cropped awkwardly)
Setting imgMaxWidth much larger than imgMinWidth in style-3 (causes inconsistent sizing)
Using low contrast colors for text on background (fails WCAG accessibility)
Not optimizing images before upload (>500KB images slow page load)
bestPractices: Limit tags to 2-4 per item for clean layout and readability
Use pipe separator (|) for tagField, test splitting in preview before publishing
Optimize images to <200KB for fast loading (use JPG at 80% quality for photos)
Use square images (1:1 aspect ratio) for style-2 circle/square shapes to avoid cropping issues
Set imageSize to 'medium' (300px) or 'large' (1024px) instead of 'full' for performance
For style-3 dotted lines, use light gray (#d1d5db) for subtle classic menu style
Use consistent image sizes across all items in a list (all 80px or all 100px)
For style-2 flip cards, ensure hover background has sufficient contrast for white text (WCAG AA)
Use responsive typography (reduce md font sizes by 10-20% for sm, 20-30% for xs)
Add subtle shadows (blur: 8-12px, spread: 0, rgba(0,0,0,0.1)) for depth without overwhelming design
For restaurant menus, use dotted line separator (style-3) for classic authentic look
Group related pricing lists in same container for visual consistency
accessibilityNotes: Ensure text colors meet WCAG AA contrast ratio: 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text (18px+)
Set alt text for imageField images in WordPress media library (required for screen readers)
Avoid color-only indicators - use text labels for important information (not just colored tags)
style-2 flip effect should work via keyboard navigation (Tab + Enter triggers flip)
Price should be marked up as price semantically (handled by block automatically)
Long descriptions should have adequate line-height (1.5-1.8) for readability
Tag text should be readable at small sizes - minimum 10-11px font size
Don't rely solely on hover states - flip cards should be accessible on touch devices
Test with screen readers: title, price, and description should be announced in logical order
performanceConsiderations: Optimize images: JPG at 80% quality, <200KB per image recommended
style-2 flip effects are GPU accelerated (CSS 3D transforms) - no performance impact
Avoid using many style-2 flip cards on a single page (>20 cards) - prefers style-1 or style-3 for lists
SVG masks (maskImg) are GPU accelerated - minimal performance impact on modern browsers
Dotted/dashed lines (style-3) are CSS borders - no performance impact
Multiple pricing lists in same page: Use CSS containment to isolate style recalculations
Lazy load images below fold (WordPress handles this automatically with loading='lazy')
Minimize custom fonts - system fonts (Arial, Georgia) load instantly, custom fonts add 50-200ms delay
Avoid gradient backgrounds on >50 items - solid colors render faster

troubleshooting.problem: Tags don't split into individual badges
troubleshooting.cause: Using wrong separator (comma instead of pipe)
troubleshooting.solution: Use pipe character | to separate tags: 'Tag1|Tag2|Tag3' not 'Tag1,Tag2,Tag3'

troubleshooting.problem: style-2 front card shows no image
troubleshooting.cause: imageField.url is empty or incorrect path
troubleshooting.solution: Upload image to WordPress media library, select image in block editor, verify URL in attributes

troubleshooting.problem: style-2 flip doesn't work on hover
troubleshooting.cause: hoverEffect not set or incorrect value

troubleshooting.solution: Set openTypography: 1 before setting fontSize, fontWeight, etc.
Use square images (1:1 aspect ratio, e.g., 800x800) for perfect circular crop

troubleshooting.cause: Browser doesn't support CSS mask-image (IE11) or invalid SVG mask
troubleshooting.solution: Test in modern browser (Chrome/Firefox/Safari), verify SVG has <mask> element with white fill

troubleshooting.cause: imgMinWidth and imgMaxWidth have different values
troubleshooting.solution: Set imgMinWidth and imgMaxWidth to same value (e.g., both 80px) for fixed sizing
